begin_sequence.description: G-Code sequence to run at the beginning of the program. Default: None

between_layers_sequence.description: G-Code sequence to run between sibling SVG groups/layers. Default: None

checksums.description: Whether to include checksums in the G-Code output. Default: false

circular_interpolation.description: Whether to use G2/G3 commands for circular interpolation. Default: false

detect_polygon_arcs.description: Enable arc detection for polygons and polylines. Default: false

dpi.description: Dots per inch for pixels, picas, points, etc. Default: 96.0

end_sequence.description: G-Code sequence to run at the end of the program. Default: None

extra_attribute_name.description: An extra attribute to include in comments, for debugging. Default: None

feedrate.description: Machine feed rate in millimeters/minute. Default: 300.0

h_align.description: Horizontal alignment when an override dimension or trim is applied. left|center|right

line_numbers.description: Whether to include line numbers in the G-Code output. Default: false

min_arc_radius.description: Minimum arc radius (in mm) below which arcs are converted to line segments. If omitted, a conservative default derived from tolerance (tolerance * 0.05) is used.

min_polygon_arc_points.description: Minimum number of points required to consider an arc in polygons. Default: 5

newline_before_comment.description: Whether to include a newline before comments in the G-Code output. Default: false

origin_x.description: The X coordinate of the origin in millimeters. Default: 0.0

origin_y.description: The Y coordinate of the origin in millimeters. Default: 0.0

override_width.description: Optional width override (e.g. "210mm"). If provided with height and trim=true acts like paper fit.

polygon_arc_tolerance.description: Maximum deviation tolerance for polygon arc detection (in mm). If omitted, uses the same tolerance as curve fitting.

tolerance.description: Curve interpolation tolerance in millimeters. Default: 0.002

tool_off_sequence.description: G-Code sequence to turn the tool off. Default: None

tool_on_sequence.description: G-Code sequence to turn the tool on. Default: None

trim.description: If true, scales tight drawing bbox into the override dimensions (paper style fit).

v_align.description: Vertical alignment when an override dimension or trim is applied. top|center|bottom
